Игра топчик в ней все понятно и все круто изменить на на логику можно играть с другом но 1 огромный ---, когда проходишь все задания которое идут по сети их больше не будет
Can we get Portal 3? This game is the best.

well this is a fantastic puzzle game but better to play first game then this one to understand. if you like half life this is in the same world as it . well the only thing that bugs me is that if you don't have friends on steam who have the second game it is super hard to find someone online so I cant really tell you if the online is good. it works with switch pro controller as well as ps4 and xbox controller, it is really easy and  for me since am not great at keyboard  and mouse. for the first game you cant use controllers you have to use mouse and keyboard .  as well the community has done amazing mods and most of the mods are free as well as the voice acting is great  so this would be a 10/10 game.  
p.s. I did not want to talk about the story because i don't want to spoil the amazing story .
Just really good buy it if you somehow haven't already played it I don't even know why I'm writing this of course you've played it because it's that good and everyone knows.

The environment and gameplay are incredibly detailed and creative. The experience as a whole is fun and intriguing. Not to mention how amazing the characters are. Filled with personality and leaving you wondering more about them and where they came from.
This is a really good game i haven't completed it yet but it is a perfect game for people that like to go fast not speed runners people that wanna go fast
Lots of puzzles and problem solving, good humor, low violence - it is to silly robots.
A bit tough because it doesn't actually tell you what the goal is, and you kinda have to just figure it out yourself, but overall very entertaining
Игра развивает мышление, смекалку и командную работу. Советую!

мне игра очень сильно понравилось.крутой сюжет,отличный геймплей,и хороший юмор.мне актёры в русском дубляже понравились, особенно мне понравился голос гладос его просто не отличить от оригинала.И у уитли голос тоже понравился но,всё же мне больше понравился голос гладос. Оценка 10\10

Um dos melhores jogos de puzzle em primeira pessoa já feitos. Mecanicamente ainda é muito agradável, mesmo anos após seu lançamento. A história é excelente e com personagens carismáticos. O único defeito são  as telas de carregamento frequentes.

Хорошая игра, в ней буквально всё хорошо геймплей, графика, сюжет, шутки и т. д.
Также есть классный кооператив в котором можно поиграть с друзьями. Купил я её вместе с первой частью (она тоже классная) за 75 руб. Всем советую. Сейчас можно купить примерно за такую же цену.
10/10

Great sequel to Portal filled with more story and much-improved graphics. I overall didn't love this one as much as the first game, probably because I felt some of the characters were annoying, and others underdeveloped. However, it was still a great game and I can see why it has become so popular over the years. The puzzles are engaging and the humor remains top-notch--- which is a rarity in the video game world.
einer der besten spiele die ich gespielt hab

Bastante curioso, diferente cualquier juego que he jugado antes.
Pone a prueba tu paciencia e inteligencia mediante puzzles que debes deducir tú solo o en multijugador. Es casi un scape room. 
Muy bueno si buscas estimulación mental, un poco aburrido si buscas diversión.
This game could be better but I enjoyed this game.

Es un juego que a pesar de los años, ha envejecido muy bien. Para jugar cooperativo es de los más divertidos que he jugado en mucho tiempo. La compra está merecida y recomendada totalmente para aquellos que quieran jugar algo coop. online.

Если вам понравился 1, вы полетите на другую планету с этой, без Valve когда-нибудь вы прочитаете это (даже если вам наплевать xd), вы сделали хорошую игру, которая несет в себе отличную историю с отличным персонажем, и о которой я вообще не говорю в двух частях . 100000000000000000000000000000000000000/10
